Koo::Rpc::Rpc::RpcProxy Class Reference

The RpcProxy class allows wrapping a server object only by giving it's name. More...

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The RpcProxy class allows wrapping a server object only by giving it's name.

For example: obj = RpcProxy('ir.values')
